tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance_reporting (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_type VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE,
    data_extracted BOOLEAN,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE data_extraction (
    extraction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    extraction_date DATE,
    extraction_type VARCHAR(50),
    database_name VARCHAR(50),
    table_name VARCHAR(50),
    extraction_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE table2 (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    industry VARCHAR(255),
    revenue DECIMAL(10,2),
    date_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE table3 (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    department VARCHAR(255),
    manager VARCHAR(255),
    hire_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance_reports (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE sql_database_connections (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    connection_name VARCHAR(255),
    database_host VARCHAR(255),
    database_name VARCHAR(255),
    username VARCHAR(255),
    password VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_checks (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    check_name VARCHAR(255),
    check_description TEXT,
    check_result BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_reports_history (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INTEGER,
    report_date DATE,
    execution_time TIMESTAMP,
    completion_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE employees (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    hire_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE departments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    manager_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    compliance_type VARCHAR(50),
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    user_id INT,
    table_affected VARCHAR(50)
)
